title: That Time I Got Reincarnated With Talent ~I’ll Work Hard Even if I Go to Another World~ - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Age Progression   Aristocracy   Cheats   Child Protagonist   Dungeons   Elemental Magic   Familial Love   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Hard-Working Protagonist   Level System   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Nobles   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Romantic Subplot   Sword And Magic   Time Skip   Weak to Strong   Wizards
author: けん
description: A NEET who wasn’t rewarded no matter how much effort he put in was reincarnated by Demi-God the moment he encountered a convenience store robber. His NEET life got smashed up unreasonably and one-sidedly. But since the Demi-God said he would grant him any talent he wants, he replied with ‘talent where effort will be blessed and rewarded proportionally’. After receiving [innate talent] and [clairvoyance] from the Demi-God, the NEET will work hard in another world.>
